overview: The "Realm Of Chaos" Full Dynamic Range CD includes a bonus DVD featuring a full, previously unreleased live performance from the legendary 1989 "Grindcrusher" tour.  Bonus DVD: Live At Rock City Nottingham 14th November 1989 1	Eternal War  2	Through The Eye Of Terror  3	All That Remains  4	World Eater  5	Lost Souls Domain  6	Drowned In Torment  7	Realm Of Chaos
title: Bolt Thrower: Realm of Chaos
